Pushes your `./dist` folder only (as root) to the `gh-pages` branch. Your published page is always `{username}.github.com/{repository}` ## Usage - To publish your distribution file, just run `gulp publish` ## Limitations and troubleshooting - It only works if your distribution folder is `./dist` (as default) - If somehow it breaks, delete folder `.publish/` and try again - If for any reason you need to rename your distribution folder, check [root](Root) instructions.
